DatabaseService Class

Defined in: socketcan.js:203
Module: Signals

A DatabaseService is usually generated once per bus to collect signals coded in the CAN messages according a DB description.

Constructor

DatabaseService

(
  • channel
  • db_desc
)

Defined in socketcan.js:203

Parameters:

  • channel Object

    RAW channel

  • db_desc Object

    Set of rules to decode/encode signals (@parse_kcd.js)

Returns:

a new DatabaseService

Methods

send

(
  • msg_name
)

Defined in socketcan.js:279

Construct a CAN message and encode all related signals according the rules. Finally send the message to the bus.

Parameters:

  • msg_name Object

    Name of the message to generate

Attributes

messages

Message

Defined in socketcan.js:216

Named array of known messages. Accessible via index and name.
